node.title: Amy Schumer among hosting trio for Oscars ceremony - reports
node.description: Comic actors Amy Schumer, Regina Hall and Wanda Sykes will host this year's Academy Awards ceremony, Variety and other media outlets are reporting.
node.content:
["Comic actors Amy Schumer, Regina Hall and Wanda Sykes will host this year's Academy Awards ceremony as producers try to attract new viewers after record-low ratings in 2021, Hollywood publication Variety and other media outlets reported on Monday.", "", "
Regina Hall is known for movies including Girls Trip and Little. Photo: AFP
", "The actors are finalising details and an announcement will be made on Tuesday (US time) on ABC's Good Morning America, Variety said. ABC, owned by Walt Disney, will broadcast the Oscars ceremony on 27 March.", "The film industry's highest honours, which are handed out by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences, have not had a host since 2018.", "Schumer won an Emmy in 2015 for her variety sketch show Inside Amy Schumer. Hall is known for movies including Girls Trip and Little. Sykes stars in and created The Upshaws and played a recurring role on Black-ish.", "", "
Comic actor Amy Schumer Photo: 2021 Getty Images
", "Representatives for the actors, the academy and ABC did not immediately respond to requests for comment.", "The Oscars were handed out by celebrity presenters but had no host in 2019, 2020 and 2021. Ratings for the telecast have fallen in recent years, dropping to a low of 10.4 million people in the United States in 2021. Viewership of other entertainment awards shows has also declined.", "The 2021 Oscars ceremony was scaled down because of the Covid-19 pandemic. The awards were handed out at a historic train station in downtown Los Angeles in front of a small audience of nominees and guests.", "This year, organisers have said the show will return to its longtime home of the Dolby Theatre in Hollywood.", "Netflix's gothic Western, The Power of the Dog, directed by New Zealander Jane Campion, leads the field for this year's Oscar nominations with 12 nods, followed by science-fiction epic Dune with 10.", "- Reuters "]
